Element.Name: STARTUP_AFTER_FGS_RESET
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: DDSEVENT_FOCUS
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: DDSEVENT_LOCKED
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: LASTMAINCONTEXT
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: ACOUSTICFEEDBACK
Element.Description: setting for acoustic touchscreen feedback

Element.Name: DISTANCEUNIT
Element.Description: defines which distance units (metric, imperial) to use

Element.Name: SPELLER_LAYOUT
Element.Description: Stores the value of current speller layout

Element.Name: DUR_STATE
Element.Description: keeps persistent state of the Data update Reminder state machine

Element.Name: DUR_COUNT_OF_STARTS
Element.Description: keeps count of starts persistently for the Data Update Reminder

Element.Name: BEEPMODE
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: ENCODER_DIRN
Element.Description: To store the direction of encoder 0-Left, 1-Right

Element.Name: DUR_NAVI_DATASET_ID
Element.Description: To save the dataset id of the SD card.. when new sd card is inserted this id will be checked to set the time for data update reminder popup.

Element.Name: DUR_BASE_SCALAR_DATETIMEVALUE
Element.Description: To store the start time for data update reminder popup

Element.Name: DUR_START_DATE
Element.Description: to disable the popup after 7 year from this date.

Element.Name: XML_VERSIONCHECK_STATUS
Element.Description: holds the status of the last version check of Arion and FGS xml verison string

Element.Name: SHOW_PRESET_MENU
Element.Description: this variable is reqd to set the state from HMI

Element.Name: LANGUAGE_FLAG
Element.Description: This flag will distinguish the first start up scenario

Element.Name: METER
Element.Description: DP related to Meter component(instrument cluster)

Element.Name: AUDIO_WRN_EVENT
Element.Description: Used for Popup event reason

Element.Name: AUDIO_WRN_TEXT
Element.Description: Popup text dispalyed in HU is sent to Meter

Element.Name: SDS_STATE
Element.Description: This shall be set when ever SDS(Voice recognition) is in Active Mode

Element.Name: CONNECTION_STATUS
Element.Description: Status whether Meter is connected or Not

Element.Name: HW_SWC_UPPERVERSION
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: HW_SWC_MIDVERSION
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: HW_SWC_LOWERVERSION
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: TIME_INFO_HOURS
Element.Description: Holds the current hour which is to be given to Meter component.

Element.Name: TIME_INFO_MINUTES
Element.Description: Holds the current minutes which is to be given to Meter component.

Element.Name: VARIANT_CONFIG
Element.Description: Contains the datapools for all configurations

Element.Name: RADIO_DAB
Element.Description: Indicates whether DAB is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: RADIO_XM
Element.Description: Indicates whether XM is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: RADIO_FM_START_FRQ
Element.Description: Stores minimum frequency value for FM

Element.Name: RADIO_FM_END_FRQ
Element.Description: Stores maximum frequency value for FM

Element.Name: RADIO_FM_STEP_SIZE
Element.Description: Stores step size value for FM

Element.Name: RADIO_AM_START_FRQ
Element.Description: Stores minimum frequency value for AM

Element.Name: RADIO_AM_END_FRQ
Element.Description: Stores maximum frequency value for AM

Element.Name: RADIO_AM_STEP_SIZE
Element.Description: Stores step size value for AM

Element.Name: RADIO_FM_NUM_BANKS
Element.Description: No. of banks for FM

Element.Name: NAVIGATION_DESTINATION_ENTRY_TYPE
Element.Description: Indicates whether destination entry is Europe or NAR

Element.Name: NAVIGATION_DISCLAIMER
Element.Description: Indicates whether enabled or disabled

Element.Name: NAVIGATION_MAP_ZOOM_TYPE
Element.Description: Indicates whether it is touch type or encoder type

Element.Name: NAVIGATION_POI_WARNING_TYPE
Element.Description: Indicates whether the POI warning is Popup type or Map type

Element.Name: TRAFFIC_TMC_SERVER
Element.Description: Indicates whether the TMC server is XM, DAB or amfm_tuner

Element.Name: TELE_SMS_GUI_HANDLING
Element.Description: Indicates whether SMS through GUI handling is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: TELE_SMS_VR
Element.Description: Indicates whether SMS through voice recognition is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: SYSTEM_NISSAN_REG_TYPE
Element.Description: Gives PI Ignore is Enabled or Not

Element.Name: SYSTEM_SPEED_LOCK
Element.Description: Indicates whether speedlock is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: SYSTEM_ENCODER_PRESS_SOUND
Element.Description: Indicated whether enabled or disabled

Element.Name: SYSTEM_ECO_FEEDBACK
Element.Description: Indicates whether enabled or disabled

Element.Name: RADIO_FM_NUM_PRESETS
Element.Description: No. of presets per FM bank

Element.Name: RADIO_AM_NUM_BANKS
Element.Description: No. of banks for AM

Element.Name: RADIO_AM_NUM_PRESETS
Element.Description: No. of presets in AM bank

Element.Name: RADIO_STATION_LIST
Element.Description: Indicates whether station list is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: RADIO_TA_TP
Element.Description: Indicates whether TA/TP is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: RADIO_REG
Element.Description: Indicates whether REG is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: RADIO_PS_FRQ
Element.Description: Indicates whether Frequency or PS will be displayed or both will be displayed

Element.Name: SYSTEM_CLOCK
Element.Description: Indicates whether clock should be shown or not

Element.Name: SYSTEM_ANTITHEFT
Element.Description: Indicates whether antitheft is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: SYSTEM_STEERING
Element.Description: Indicates whether steering is left hand or right hand (Steering Position)

Element.Name: SYSTEM_VR
Element.Description: Indicates whether voice recognition is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: RADIO_AREA
Element.Description: Stores the Tuner Area

Element.Name: NAVIGATION_DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_TYPE
Element.Description: Default laguge for each region type

Element.Name: SYSTEM_STEERING_WHEEL
Element.Description: Datapool to store the Steering wheel type

Element.Name: RADIO_SEEK_MODE
Element.Description: Datapool to store the Seek mode configuration

Element.Name: SYSTEM_WEATHER_SRC
Element.Description: It stores the source of weather information

Element.Name: SYSTEM_TELEMATICS
Element.Description: Datapool to store telematics configuration

Element.Name: RADIO_TUNER_MODE
Element.Description: Datapool to store the tuner mode

Element.Name: SYSTEM_DISTANCE_UNIT
Element.Description: Datapool to store Distance Unit configuration

Element.Name: NAVIGATION_EV
Element.Description: Datapool to store the electro vehicle configuration

Element.Name: ECOROUTE_TRANSMISSION_TYPE
Element.Description: Transmission type shall be one of the parameters to be used in the calculation of the fuel consumption optimized route.

Element.Name: ECOROUTE_DRAG_COEFFICIENT
Element.Description: The drag coefficient (CW value) shall be one of the parameters to be used in the calculation of the fuel consumption optimized route.

Element.Name: ECOROUTE_FUEL_TYPE
Element.Description: Type of fuet used for car - Petrol/Disel

Element.Name: SYSTEM_VEHICLE_TYPE
Element.Description: Vehicle type (e.g. X12B)

Element.Name: SMART_PHONE
Element.Description: to enable/disable Smart phone..

Element.Name: SIRI_AVAILABILITY
Element.Description: to enable/disable SIRI..

Element.Name: VA_AVAILABILITY
Element.Description: to enable/disable VA..

Element.Name: CM_DISPLAY_TYPE
Element.Description: provides information which type of display is configured (ex. 5,8" / 7" / 8")

Element.Name: TRAFFIC_TMC_SERVER_FM
Element.Description: Indicates whether the TMC server is amfm_tuner

Element.Name: TRAFFIC_TMC_SERVER_DAB
Element.Description: Indicates whether the TMC server is DAB

Element.Name: TRAFFIC_TMC_SERVER_XM
Element.Description: Indicates whether the TMC server is XM

Element.Name: DAB_AVAILABILITY
Element.Description: The value is located in System Configuration 1, Byte 43, Bit 0. The purpose is to provide a possibility to disable/enable DAB by Nissan diagnostics configuration within a DAB device.

Element.Name: SYSTEM_OPENING_ANIMATION
Element.Description: Gives us the Opening Animation value: NISSAN and Renault

Element.Name: SYSTEM_ISA
Element.Description: Indicates ISA status (external speed limit detection camera availbility)

Element.Name: RADIO_PI_IGNORE
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: NAVIGATION_MINIMIZE_UNPAVED_ROADS
Element.Description: DP to store Minimize Unpaved Roads in Navigation Route Option. 0 ---- OFF 1 ---- ON

Element.Name: POSITIONING_SYSTEM
Element.Description: 0 : GPS 1 : GLONASS

Element.Name: HEV
Element.Description: 0 - HEV disabled 1- HEV Enabled

Element.Name: HEV_DRIVETYPE
Element.Description: Gives the Drive type of the HEV vehicle : 4 Wheel Drive, Front Engine, Rear Engine, etc

Element.Name: HEV_BODY_SHAPE
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: TCU
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: VEHICLE_BODY_SHAPE
Element.Description: GIves information about body shape of vehicle ex- sedan,coupe,wagon,van

Element.Name: REGION_ITG5
Element.Description: Gives information about region - US,CAN,EUR,THI etc

Element.Name: METER_CLOCK_SYNCHRONISATION
Element.Description: Gives information about whether or not meter and clock are synchronised .

Element.Name: STEERING_SW_ITG5
Element.Description: Gives information about steering wheel type.

Element.Name: TPMS_FUNCTION
Element.Description: Gives information about tpms function 00 = off,01 = on without ER regulation, 10 = ON (with EUR Regulation) 11 = OFF (with V-CAN Communication )

Element.Name: HVAC_TYPE
Element.Description: 000 = None 001 = 06IT single temp with no operation 010 = 06IT dual temp with no operation 011 = 08IT dual temp with operation 100 = 08IT dual temp with no operation 101 = IT Gen5 Type 110 = IT-Gen5 GD1A type 111 = Reserved

Element.Name: METER_COMBI_UNIT_SETTING
Element.Description: 00 = No combination 01 = Reserve 10 = Setting Unit from Meter (ITM don't have unit setting) 11 = Setting Unit from ITM

Element.Name: DRIVER_ASSISTANCE_FUNCTION
Element.Description: 0 = OFF 1 = ON

Element.Name: AVERAGE_FUEL_CONSUMPTION_DISPLAY
Element.Description: 000 = OFF 001 = Bar graph (ITM calcurates) 010 = Numeric number (ITM calcurates) 011 = Bar graph from V-CAN 100 = Numeric number from V-CAN 101 to 111 = Reserved

Element.Name: METER_COMBI_LANGUGAE_SETTING
Element.Description: 0 = No combination 1 = Combination

Element.Name: BACKGROUND_COLOUR
Element.Description: '0 = Infiniti 1 = Nissan

Element.Name: DATE_INFORMATION
Element.Description: "0 = with date 1 = without date"

Element.Name: NAVI
Element.Description: 0 = With Navi 1 = Without Navi

Element.Name: TCU2
Element.Description: 00 = Without TCU2 01 = With TCU2 (Only eCall) 10 = With TCU2 (full service) 11 = Reserved

Element.Name: CAMERA_SYSTEM_ANTICIPATORY_LINE
Element.Description: 0 = None 1 = Anticipatory line

Element.Name: CAMERA_SYSTEM_RVC_GUIDELINE
Element.Description: gives information about RVC guideline ex : [0xB2] H61B RHD

Element.Name: CAMERA_SYSTEM
Element.Description: 000 = None 001= Entry AVM 010 = Rear camera 011 = Rear + Side camera 100 = AVM 101 = Rear camera - Tailgate 110=AVM+IPA 111=AVM Phase3

Element.Name: RSE
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: BCM_TYPE
Element.Description: 0 = type3 1 = type2

Element.Name: VEHICLE_CONFIGUARTION
Element.Description: 0 = None 1 = communication

Element.Name: FUEL_CONSUMPTION_INFORMATION
Element.Description: 0 = OFF 1 = ON

Element.Name: HD_RADIO_AVAILABILITY
Element.Description: 0 -Non availability 1 - available

Element.Name: ITG5_AMPLIFIER
Element.Description: [0x00] 5.1ch AMP(M-CAN BOSE) [0x01] 4ch AMP (Non M-CAN BOSE) [0x02] No external AMP [0x03] 2ch (M-CAN BOSE)

Element.Name: NISSAN_DRIVING_TYPE
Element.Description: 2 Bit [0x00] front [0x01] rear [0x02] 4WD

Element.Name: OFFROAD_INFORMATION
Element.Description: O- Disabled 1 - Enabled

Element.Name: VIDEO_DIMMING
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: BRIGHTNESS
Element.Description: Holds the brightness value of the Video screen

Element.Name: CONTRAST
Element.Description: Holds the contrast value of the Video screen.

Element.Name: COLOR
Element.Description: Holds the color value of the Video screen

Element.Name: HUE
Element.Description: Holds the hue value of the Video screen

Element.Name: REQ_MODE_AM_PM
Element.Description: Waiting for a meaningful text ...

Element.Name: OVER_SPEED_ACTIVE
Element.Description: Indicates whether actual speed is above the speed limit

Element.Name: CLOCK_SCREEN_MODE
Element.Description: Datapool to store whether Clock screen-saver is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: SCREEN_LOCK_COUNTER
Element.Description: Holds the screen lock counter value

Element.Name: CALIBRATION
Element.Description: Datapools for the screen calibration in developer testmode

Element.Name: PAGE_NUMBER
Element.Description: Datapool to store the page number of the calibration screen

Element.Name: STATUS
Element.Description: Datapool to store the calibration status

Element.Name: CALIBRATION_SOURCE
Element.Description: The datapool has the source of calibration

Element.Name: AUTO_MODE_METER
Element.Description: Has the status of whether the user has selected the automatic mode.

Element.Name: ENABLE_DISABLE_AUTO_BUTTON
Element.Description: This datapool tells whether to enable or disable the Automatic button in the Language Menu .
